he2019bag.paper_names: Bag of Tricks for Image Classification with Convolutional Neural Networks
he2019bag.authors: He, Tong and Zhang, Zhi and Zhang, Hang and Zhang, Zhongyue and Xie, Junyuan and Li, Mu
he2019bag.publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
he2019bag.brief: 该文章介绍了很多在图像分类领域的常用trick，具有很强的实践意义。
